TopicTitle: Game has been crashing randomly. Checked the log and I found 'The referenced script on this Behaviour (Game Object 'ScreenKerbalsInventory') is missing!'

Articles.Content:
Game has been crashing randomly. Checked the log and I found 'The referenced script on this Behaviour (Game Object 'ScreenKerbalsInventory') is missing!'

Is there anyway to easily fix this issue?
